comments.body:
only `Index.format` is available in the docs https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/dev/reference/api/pandas.Index.format.html

there was a simliar issue in the 1.1.1 whatsnew, https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/35787#issuecomment-675982758, which I left as-is.

If you can come up with a way to resolve this, great (and also fix note in 1.1.1 for `CategoricalIndex.format()` a bonus)
I looked briefly at it, wasn't sure how to do it, so I left it as is.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Regression in :meth:`DatetimeIndex.intersection` incorrectly raising ``AssertionError`` when intersecting against a list (:issue:`35876`)
- Performance regression for :meth:`RangeIndex.format` (:issue:`35712`)
-
